name: [TwitchStreamGame] Feckship Elite Interactive!
description:
[N.B.] This game can ONLY be played on twitch.tv/irishjohngames when an [Interactive Battle Royale] redeem is active. A prompt will appear on stream and in chat when this is the case. Controls
  • W S A D Controls for thrust/turning
  • SPACE to fire once the game starts!
  • M to mute during gameplay.
This game is in a super-early access and in an early development state. Please expect PLENTY of bugs & annoyances, but we still have alot of enjoyment in the playtests.  This is an interactive game that requires activation via twitch. It is not possible to play this game when the IBR is inactive.

IrishJohnGames is a software and game development stream focused on development of Rise of Piracy with nightly streams at 9pm BST. Drop by with any questions when live, or join the discord.
